title: Palm Safe Aloe Vera Alcohol Hand Sanitiser 250 ml Disc Top Bottle
features: UNSCENTED HAND SANITISER - Perfect for hypersensitive skin, the Aloe Vera hand sanitiser is fragrance-free and gentle on your skin! Contains only aloe vera to moisturise and protect. Once the alcohol evaporates, this gel-based, antibacterial sanitiser will leave your hands feeling clean with a light, refreshing aroma that lingers hours after application.

70% ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL - Instead of using ethanol, our hand sanitisers contain isopropyl alcohol. The medical-grade alcohol is known to be non-drying and gentle on the skin. All our sanitisers use 70% isopropyl by volume and are tested to BSEN 1500 and BSEN 1726 standards.

MOISTURISING, GEL-BASED SANITISER - We’ve ensured that you can use our hand sanitisers frequently by adding aloe vera to our products. The moisturising properties of the aloe vera gel will leave your skin hydrated after every use. The antibacterial hand gel formulation evaporates quickly and isn’t even the slightest bit sticky!

TRAVEL SIZED - Take your 250ml Palm Safe disc top bottle sanitiser with you wherever you go. Each hand sanitiser gel is kitted with a secure disc top that doesn’t leak and can be placed in handbags, school and sports bags or desk drawers. The 250ml bottles can also be used to refill the smaller-sized 60ml bottles that have screw tops and wide necks.

MADE IN SCOTLAND - We’re on a mission to make hand sanitiser that is gentle on your skin, scented, fast-drying, non-sticky and moisturising. Available in 30 scents, from designer to fruity favourites - there’s a fragrance for everyone. Sizes include 60ml, 250ml, 500ml and 1L bottles - and 5L commercial containers.
description: Product Description Palm Safe Unscented Aloe Vera Hand Sanitiser Gel Top Disc Bottle- Moisturise and Protect - Formulated with Isopropyl Alcohol and Aloe Vera - Travel Size Bottle, 250ml Not all hand sanitisers are made equal Palm Safe has set out to create the best possible hand sanitisers on the market. Instead of using ethanol, our products contain medical-grade isopropyl - an alcohol base known to be non-drying and gentle on the skin. We’ve ensured that you can use our hand sanitisers frequently by adding aloe vera to our products. The moisturising properties of aloe vera will leave your skin hydrated after every use. The Palm Safe gel formulation evaporates quickly and isn’t even the slightest bit sticky! Travel and refill sizes Take your 250ml Palm Safe sanitiser with you wherever you go. Each sanitiser is kitted with a secure disc top which prevents leaks, making it perfect to place in handbags, school and sports bags or desk drawers The 250ml bottles can also be used to refill the smaller-sized 60ml bottles that have screw tops and wide necks. 30 different scents Available in 30 different scents you’ll love. As soon as the alcohol evaporates, our scents come through and linger subtly for hours after application. There’s a scent for everyone, from designer to fresh and fruity favourites. Scents include Alien Invasion, Millionaire, Savage, Watermelon, Rhubarb and Plum, Cola Cubes, Apple & Cinnamon, Mango, Coconut and Lemon. Palm Safe Palm Safe is a Scottish business on a mission to make the best possible hand sanitiser. Gentle on your skin, subtle scents, fast-drying, non-sticky and extra moisturising. Pick your favourite scent from our range. Available in 60ml, 250ml, 500ml and 1L bottles - and 5L commercial refillable containers. Ingredients 70% Isopropyl alcohol, distilled water, aloe vera, carbomer 940, Triethanolamine.
